Class UnitLengthNormaliser

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InputData

    public class UnitLengthNormaliser
extends AbstractNormaliser
    Unit length normalisation, normalises the length of the instance to 1.
    Version:
    $Id: UnitLengthNormaliser.java 3358 2010-02-11 14:35:07Z mayer $
    Author:
    Rudolf Mayer
